alert.note: Alert for Ida (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:18AM CDT until July 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR CHEROKEE...BUENA VISTA AND IDA COUNTIES... At 617 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Larrabee to near Galva to 10 miles south of Ida Grove, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Storm Lake, Sioux Rapids, Lakeside, Truesdale, Albert City and Marathon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
